name: discrepantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows a difference between two things that should be the same: These children had discrepantly low reading ability relative to their I.Q. It is a relatively wealthy country with discrepantly high levels of infant mortality. Related words
discrepant
discrepancy
More examplesFewer examplesThis method results in a range of discrepantly low ages.Discrepantly coded cases were resolved by consensus review.These were the three most discrepantly ranked occupations in the survey.A third group contained patients who appeared to be discrepantly classified because of coding errors.
